item.title: PoisonSeed Hackers Bypass FIDO Keys Using QR Phishing and Cross-Device Sign-In Abuse - The Hacker News
item.description:

  3. New PoisonSeed Attack Let Attackers Trick Users into Scanning a QR Code with an MFA Authenticator  CyberSecurityNews
  4. A PoisonSeed phishing campaign is bypassing FIDO2 security key protections by abusing the cross-device sign-in feature in WebAuthn to trick users into approving login authentication requests from fake company portals. [...] #Security  LinkedIn
  5. Hackers can bypass FIDO MFA keys, putting your accounts at risk - here's what we know  TechRadar
